## Data Files

Download the complete dataset: [data-modified.zip](data-modified.zip)

### Individual Files

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| [hotels_modified.csv](modified/hotels_modified.csv) | Basic hotel information (200 hotels) |
| [cities_modified.csv](modified/cities_modified.csv) | City information (10 cities) |
| [monthly_occupancy_modified.csv](modified/monthly_occupancy_modified.csv) | Monthly hotel performance (~3,800 rows) |
| [city_tourism_modified.csv](modified/city_tourism_modified.csv) | Monthly tourism statistics (240 rows) |
| [economic_indicators.csv](modified/economic_indicators.csv) | Monthly economic indicators (24 rows) |
| [reviews_modified.csv](modified/reviews_modified.csv) | Hotel guest reviews (~1,700 rows) |
| [amenities.csv](modified/amenities.csv) | List of hotel amenities (10 items) |
| [hotel_amenities_modified.csv](modified/hotel_amenities_modified.csv) | Hotel-amenity relationships (~1,000 rows) |
